agents.title: AppSec Review Agent
agents.description: Reviews diffs and PRs for common application security issues.

agents.title: Secrets Scan Agent
agents.description: Scans code and config for hard-coded secrets and credentials.

agents.title: Dependency Audit Agent
agents.description: Reviews dependency manifests and lockfiles for vulnerable packages.

agents.title: API Hardening Agent
agents.description: Assists with reviewing and hardening API endpoints and schemas.

agents.title: CI Security Guard Agent
agents.description: Reviews CI pipelines for insecure patterns and missing checks.

agents.title: Infra Drift Detector Agent
agents.description: Helps detect and explain infrastructure drift from IaC baselines.

agents.title: Log Anomaly Hunter Agent
agents.description: Guides log triage to find suspicious or anomalous events.

agents.title: Compliance Checker Agent
agents.description: Reviews artifacts against basic compliance checklists (e.g. SOC2-style).

agents.title: Phishing Simulation Agent
agents.description: Helps design and analyze phishing simulation campaigns.

agents.title: Vulnerability Triage Assistant
agents.description: Assists in triaging vulnerability reports and prioritizing fixes.

agents.title: Threat Modeling Coach Agent
agents.description: Guides developers through lightweight threat modeling exercises.

skills.title: Threat Intel Enricher
skills.description: Enriches security alerts with external threat intelligence feeds.

skills.title: SAST Helper Skill
skills.description: Interprets static analysis results and suggests code fixes.

skills.title: DAST Helper Skill
skills.description: Explains dynamic scan findings and how to reproduce them safely.

skills.title: Compliance Writer Skill
skills.description: Drafts security policy and compliance documentation from templates.

skills.title: Incident Timeline Builder Skill
skills.description: Helps construct clear timelines from fragmented incident data.

skills.title: Cloud Config Auditor Skill
skills.description: Reviews cloud configuration snippets for common misconfigurations.

skills.title: Kubernetes Security Auditor Skill
skills.description: Analyzes Kubernetes manifests for insecure settings.

skills.title: RBAC Analyzer Skill
skills.description: Helps analyze and simplify complex RBAC configurations.

skills.title: Security Log Parser Skill
skills.description: Parses and normalizes various security log formats.

skills.title: Risk Register Helper Skill
skills.description: Assists in drafting and updating entries in a risk register.

skills.title: Red Team Automation Skill
skills.description: Helps design repeatable red-team style test plans and workflows.

commands.title: scan_repo Command
commands.description: Runs a security scan over the current repository.

commands.title: summarize_alerts Command
commands.description: Summarizes a batch of alerts into a concise incident briefing.

commands.title: review_ci_pipeline Command
commands.description: Reviews CI configuration files for missing security checks.

commands.title: analyze_logs Command
commands.description: Parses and analyzes logs for suspicious patterns.

commands.title: inspect_k8s_manifests Command
commands.description: Inspects Kubernetes manifests for insecure defaults.

commands.title: cloud_config_diff Command
commands.description: Compares two versions of cloud config to highlight risky drift.

commands.title: review_secrets_usage Command
commands.description: Reviews how secrets are fetched and used in code paths.

commands.title: threat_model_session Command
commands.description: Guides a short, text-based threat-modeling session for a feature.

commands.title: policy_gap_check Command
commands.description: Checks implementation details against high-level security policy.

commands.title: triage_finding Command
commands.description: Helps triage an individual security finding for impact and priority.

commands.title: prepare_incident_report Command
commands.description: Generates a structured incident report draft from raw notes.

mcp.title: Threat Intel MCP
mcp.description: MCP server for enriching alerts with external threat intel.

mcp.title: Code SAST MCP
mcp.description: Remote static analysis MCP server for code repositories.

mcp.title: Dependency Audit MCP
mcp.description: Checks dependencies against a vulnerability database.

mcp.title: Cloud Config MCP
mcp.description: Analyzes cloud configuration documents for risk.

mcp.title: Log Analytics MCP
mcp.description: Provides log search and aggregation capabilities.

mcp.title: SIEM Connector MCP
mcp.description: Connects to a SIEM to pull and summarize alerts.

mcp.title: Kubernetes Audit MCP
mcp.description: Analyzes Kubernetes audit logs for suspicious events.

mcp.title: CloudTrail MCP
mcp.description: Surfaces interesting CloudTrail events to Claude.

mcp.title: Phishing Intel MCP
mcp.description: Provides signals about known phishing domains and senders.

mcp.title: Malware Intel MCP
mcp.description: Looks up file hashes and URLs against malware feeds.

mcp.title: IP Reputation MCP
mcp.description: Provides reputation and geo information for IP addresses.
